divs: sighting detailsi alway look in the sky almost every night because my wife said she had seen a ufo about 200 feet high back in nov 2011 around our neighborhood and a bigger one in july 2005. i finally seen this object on 2\14\12 at 8 pm. i got my video camera out to record but out of battery but i used my benocular to watch it for 15 minutes. the object seem to hoover above the navy base in seal beach. i saw the object moving toward catalina island but then it came back to the same position by navy base again. i look out my window again the next night around 8 pm and there the object again and film it for 11 minutes and then it took off. i look at the same spot on 2\16\12 at 7 pm and saw the object much closer within a mile. i took my camera out and film it. all of a sudden a hear a loud "hum" for 15 second which heard my ear when i was filming the object. it got closer to my house but then it move back further away. i can see airplane flying over the object which mean the object is pretty low. the object is still can be seen right at this minute while i am typing my story. if anyone live in orange county, please let me know what this object is.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Garden Grove

Summary: Objects been around for the passed 3 day now.
